mapper.insert: insert into message(content, chatroom_id, sender_id) values(#{content},#{chatroomId}, #{senderId})
mapper.select: select t1.id as id, #{roomId} as chatroomId, t1.content as content, t1.sender_id as senderId, t2.userNickname as senderNickname from ( select id, content, sender_id from message inner join(select `id` from message where chatroom_id=#{roomId} order by id desc limit #{idx}, 10) as q using (`id`) where chatroom_id=#{roomId}) as t1 inner join user as t2 on t1.sender_id = t2.userNo;
